boardgame.name: Helios
boardgame.description: In Helios, players are high priests in a distant world of the sun god AHAU, and the power of the sun drives everything in the game as players try to build temples, expand cities, and make their civilization flourish._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Development can succeed, though, only if you've secured a supply of the limited raw materials available, and the more that you've built of your temple, the more expensive the remaining parts will be. Glass manastones are the game's currency, and with them you can acquire people, increase the number of points you'll score, and more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 30 -- Long-eared, Humanoid, Dwarf People Praying to the Sun
Episode 81-- Gen Con 2014 Top 11 to Try and Top 11 to Buy with special gues W. Eric Martin from BGG News
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Stadt Land Spielt Limitierter Sonderdruck Tag des Gesellschaftsspiels
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Game Pit: Episode 26 - Picking Over the Bones

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Helios German first edition Publisher: Hans im Glück Verlags-GmbH
Very good condition with a little box rash. This is the German language version but the English rules are available online. $14 to ship USPs priority insured.

NEW IN SHRINK - Available now Corners of box are slightly dinged from shipping, but everything is completely sealed and intact. Hans im Glück German version, but I will provide a printout of my English rules translation (also available here on BGG). Components are completely language independent. FREE SHIPPING (for CONUS only).

This is a brand new copy of the Z-man Games edition of Helios. I will ship via USPS Priority Mail so shipping is $11.

The game is unplayed and still in shrink wrap! I will ship from Germany and I am willing to ship anywhere. Please ask me, for the shipping costs for your land. I will charge shipping at cost. Everything will be well packed. You can pay me through Paypal or bank transfer to my German bank account but any fees charged must be covered by you. If you buy more games, then I make all in one package! We have a large private collection of games. Due to space and time constraints we must rid ourselves of some of the games. Therefore, these are private sales.
